title: Keelzebub
description: Keeley Thomson is fighting to learn as much as she can in order to survive. That sounds like pretty much what everyone is doing doesn’t it? As a young Greater Demon though it means a lot more, since almost everyone in existence wants her dead.Or they will if they find out what she is.As a new threat comes, Keeley has to come up with a new plan and teach the world why she’d called the Mistress of Souls, before it's too late.
author: P.S. Power
